body: Can we add a constructor `List<Attribute>::create(std::vector<TreeRef> &)` that does a checked construction of these lists? Then we can have `List<Attribute>(TreeRef &)` perform the unchecked construction as it already does.
body_html: Can we add a constructor List<Attribute>::create(std::vector<TreeRef> &) that does a checked construction of these lists? Then we can have List<Attribute>(TreeRef &) perform the unchecked construction as it already does.
body_text: Can we add a constructor List<Attribute>::create(std::vector<TreeRef> &) that does a checked construction of these lists? Then we can have List<Attribute>(TreeRef &) perform the unchecked construction as it already does.
